dialog.about.astrocite: Enables Zettlr to display citations from BibTex libraries
dialog.about.chartjs: Displays your writing statistics in a nice chart
dialog.about.chokidar: Detects any changes you make to your files outside the app
dialog.about.citationstyle: Zettlr makes use of citeproc to display citations directly in the editor. To this end, Zettlr uses the CitationStyleLanguage (CSL) language and style files. The files have been shipped unaltered with author metadata. More information:
dialog.about.citeproc: Renders correct citations for all works
dialog.about.jquery: Makes it easy to render the whole user interface
dialog.about.lead: Zettlr is a project by Hendrik Erz, licensed under the GNU GPL v3 license. It is Open Source, free of charge and based upon the Electron framework. Zettlr would like to thank the developers of Electron, the Node.js framework and the CodeMirror editor for their work. Without them, Zettlr would not be possible. Below you can find all projects that Zettlr uses.
dialog.about.lessjs: Helps a lot in writing the styles for Zettlr
dialog.about.other_projects: Zettlr also makes use of these projects:
dialog.about.showdownjs: Renders the Changelog so that you can see what's changed in an update
dialog.about.tippyjs: That's where the nice tooltips come from
dialog.about.title: About Zettlr
dialog.about.trademark: All logos and brand names are subject to their rightful owners. Besides using their code, Zettlr is in no way affiliated with any of these projects. Node.js is a trademark of Joyent, Inc.
dialog.custom_css.info: Here you can override the styles of Zettlr to customise it even further. Attention: This file overrides all CSS directives! Never alter the geometry of elements, otherwise the app may expose unwanted behaviour!
dialog.custom_css.title: Custom CSS
dialog.defaults.explanation: Edit the default settings for imports or exports here.
dialog.defaults.invalid_warning: This profile appears to be either missing the writer or reader property. Make sure to set both so that Zettlr can use this profile.
dialog.defaults.protected_warning: This profile is protected. This means that it will be restored when you remove or rename it.
dialog.error.name: Dialog Error
dialog.error.no_data: Could not initialize dialog. Data was %s.
dialog.error.no_init: The dialog has not been initialized!
dialog.error.unknown_dialog: The requested dialog '%s' does not exist.
dialog.export.no_pandoc: Could not find pandoc. Please install pandoc to enable the file exporting options!
dialog.export.no_xelatex: Could not find the xelatex executable on your system. Please make sure to install LaTeX to be able to export to PDF.
dialog.paste_image.info: Here is a preview of the image that is currently in your clipboard. Hit return to save it to the current directory, or choose a custom directory.
dialog.paste_image.title: Insert Image from Clipboard
dialog.preferences.always_reload_files: Always load remote changes to the current file
dialog.preferences.app_lang.title: Application language (Restart required!)
dialog.preferences.attachments_info: Enter all file extensions that you want to see in your attachment sidebar. Separate them with a comma. Changes are recognised after a restart.
dialog.preferences.auto_save.label: Autosave
dialog.preferences.autocorrect.replaceme: Here you can define certain strings that will be replaced when AutoCorrect is on. The characters on the left side will be replaced with whatever comes on the right.
dialog.preferences.autocorrect.style_lib: LibreOffice style (press Space or Enter to replace)
dialog.preferences.autocorrect.style_wor: Word style (replace immediately without pressing Space/Enter)
dialog.preferences.autocorrect.title: AutoCorrect
dialog.preferences.avoid_new_tabs: Avoid opening files in new tabs if possible
dialog.preferences.check_translation_upd: Check for updated translations on start
dialog.preferences.citations.title: Citations
dialog.preferences.cite_style_label: How would you like autocomplete to insert your citations?
dialog.preferences.count_chars: Count characters instead of words (e.g., for Chinese)
dialog.preferences.delete_on_fail: Delete items irreversibly, if moving them to trash fails
dialog.preferences.display.hide_toolbar_: Hide toolbar in distraction free mode
dialog.preferences.display.image_size_in: With these controls you can constrain the image previews.
dialog.preferences.display.preview_info: These options determine which elements are rendered in documents.
dialog.preferences.display.title: Display
dialog.preferences.display.use_first_hea: If present, use the first heading level 1 instead of the filename
dialog.preferences.editor_setting.rtl_mo: Use visual order for arrow key movement while in RTL-mode
dialog.preferences.enable_scroll_zoom: Zoom when scrolling while holding down <kbd>Cmd</kbd> or <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>
dialog.preferences.export.dest: Target directory for exported files. Attention: Selecting the current working directory will overwrite files without warning!
dialog.preferences.export.dest_cwd_label: Current working directory: exported files will be saved into the currently selected directory.
dialog.preferences.export.title: Export
dialog.preferences.export.use_bundled_pa: Use the internal Pandoc for exports
dialog.preferences.filemanager_combined: Combined — show files and directories in the file tree
dialog.preferences.filemanager_expanded: Expanded — show both file tree and file list
dialog.preferences.filemanager_thin: Thin — show either file tree or file list
dialog.preferences.filename_display.head: First heading level 1 if applicable
dialog.preferences.filename_display.titl: Title or first heading level 1 if applicable
dialog.preferences.formatting_characters: Choose the formatting characters that the bold/emphasis commands should use
dialog.preferences.homeEndBehaviour: Use the CodeMirror default actions for <kbd>Home</kbd> and <kbd>End</kbd>.
dialog.preferences.indent_unit: Indent by the following number of spaces
dialog.preferences.leave_app_running_in_: Leave app running in the notification area
dialog.preferences.mute_lines: Mute non-focused lines in distraction-free mode
dialog.preferences.new_file_dont_prompt: Do not prompt for filename when creating new files
dialog.preferences.pandoc: Path to pandoc executable. Please only change, if Zettlr is unable to locate pandoc.
dialog.preferences.pdf.author: Author
dialog.preferences.pdf.lineheight_label: Line height (in percent relative to font size, i.e.: 150% equals 1.5 lines spacing)
dialog.preferences.pdf.mainfont_label: Main font (must match exactly a font installed on your computer)
dialog.preferences.pdf.metadata_intro: These metadata are written into the respective fields on PDF generation. Separate keywords with comma.
dialog.preferences.pdf.page_intro: Adjust the page layout settings. The margins can be in cm, mm or pt.
dialog.preferences.pdf.sansfont_label: Secondary font (must match exactly a font installed on your computer)
dialog.preferences.pdf.title: PDF Settings
dialog.preferences.pdf.toc_label: Generate table of contents and evaluate until level
dialog.preferences.project.pattern: Add Glob patterns to include only specific files
dialog.preferences.project.title: Project settings
dialog.preferences.readability_algorithm: Algorithm to use for the readability mode
dialog.preferences.show_app_in_the_notif: Show app in the notification area
dialog.preferences.sorting_explanation: Sorting order for files (used for sorting by name)
dialog.preferences.sorting_time_explanat: When sorting by time, sort by
dialog.preferences.spellcheck: Select the languages for which you want to enable automatic spell checking.
dialog.preferences.spellcheck_warning: Attention: Too many active spell check libraries may slow the app down significantly! Try to stick with three at maximum.
dialog.preferences.spellchecking.title: Spellchecking
dialog.preferences.theme.accent_color_in: This setting is only available on Windows and macOS
dialog.preferences.theme.accent_color_la: Use the operating system's accent colour instead of the theme colour
dialog.preferences.theme.info: Here you can choose the theme for the app.
dialog.preferences.theme.title: Theme
dialog.preferences.title: Preferences
dialog.preferences.toolbar.title: Toolbar
dialog.preferences.user_dictionary: User dictionary. Remove words by clicking them.
dialog.preferences.watchdog_explainer: On some computers, Zettlr may report too many remote file changes. If this happens, try activating this setting.
dialog.preferences.watchdog_threshold_la: Time to wait before writing a file is considered done (in ms)
dialog.preferences.xelatex: Path to xelatex executable. Please only change, if Zettlr is unable to locate it.
dialog.preferences.zkn.auto_create_file: Automatically create non-existing files when following internal links
dialog.preferences.zkn.auto_search: Start a search when following Zettelkasten-links
dialog.preferences.zkn.custom_directory: Put auto-created files into this directory (must be loaded in Zettlr)
dialog.preferences.zkn.id_generator_labe: Pattern used to generate new IDs
dialog.preferences.zkn.intro: On this page you can adjust Zettlr to work with your existing Zettelkasten workflow. The ID is based upon regular expressions, so please make sure to escape RegEx-characters that literally occur in your IDs. Test the generation (and detection) of IDs by clicking the button below. Check the manual to see all possible variables for the ID generator.
dialog.preferences.zkn.link_behaviour_de: When linking files, add the filename ‚Ä¶
dialog.preferences.zkn.link_behaviour_id: only when linking using the ID
dialog.preferences.zkn.pass_check_no: Your regular expression did not match the generated ID.
dialog.preferences.zkn.pass_check_yes: The generated ID was recognised by the regular expression!
dialog.preferences.zkn.title: Zettelkasten
dialog.preferences.zoom_behavior.editor: Zoom changes the editor font size
dialog.preferences.zoom_behavior.label: Zoom behavior
dialog.snippets.explanation: Snippets let you define reusable pieces of text with variables.
dialog.snippets.title: Snippets
dialog.statistics.intro: Here you can find extended statistics on your writing behaviour, such as a detailed graph of your words per day.
dialog.statistics.title: Writing statistics
dialog.tag_cloud.info: Here you find all tags that you've used somewhere in your files. You can copy the whole list to the clipboard. Hover over the tags to see the number of times you've used them.
dialog.tag_cloud.suggestions_label: Suggested tags for the current file
dialog.tag_cloud.title: Tag Cloud
dialog.tags.desc_desc: A short and concise description (max. 100 characters)
dialog.tags.description: Here you can assign colours to different tags. If a tag is found in a file, its tile in the preview list will receive a coloured indicator. The description will be shown on mouse hover.
dialog.tags.title: Manage tags
dialog.update.client_error: Could not check for updates: Client Error (Status code: %s)
dialog.update.connection_error: Could not check for updates: Could not establish connection
dialog.update.new_update_available: An update to version %s is available!
dialog.update.no_data: Could not check for updates: Server hasn't sent any data
dialog.update.no_new_update: No update available. You have the most recent version.
dialog.update.notification: There is a new version of Zettlr available to download. Please read the changelog below.
dialog.update.redirect_error: Could not check for updates: The server tried to redirect (Status code: %s)
dialog.update.server_error: Could not check for updates: Server Error (Status code: %s)
dialog.update.title: New update available
dialog.update.transmission_error: Could not check for updates: Connection interrupted
gui.avg_close_to: üí™ You're close to hitting your daily average!
gui.avg_not_reached: ‚úçüèº Get writing to surpass your daily average.
gui.chart.high_legend: More than twice the monthly average
gui.citeproc.error_db: The citation database could not be loaded
gui.citeproc.error_report_message: %s items in your library could not be loaded due to errors. Please check the error messages below to see which CiteKeys are malformed and what the error was.
gui.citeproc.references_booting: The citeproc engine is still booting up ‚Ä¶
gui.citeproc.references_none: There are no citations in this document.
gui.citeproc.reloading: Changes to the library file detected. Reloading ‚Ä¶
gui.global_search.title: Full-Text Search
system.error.already_exists_message: The file/directory %s already exists in target.
system.error.citation_no_attachments: The reference with key %s does not appear to have attachments.
system.error.delete_root_message: You cannot remove the root directory.
system.error.dnf_message: The requested directory was not found.
system.error.export_temp_file: Could not remove the temporary file "%s". Please remove it manually.
system.error.fnf_message: The requested file was not found.
system.error.ignored_dir_message: Directory "%s" cannot be opened by Zettlr.
system.error.move_into_child_message: You cannot move a directory into one of its subdirectories.
system.error.no_allowed_chars: The provided name did not contain any allowed letters.
system.error.no_pandoc_message: Pandoc has not been found on this system. Please install Pandoc prior to exporting or importing files.
system.error.no_xelatex_message: Zettlr couldn't detect a LaTeX-distribution on this system. Please install LaTeX prior to exporting to PDF.
system.error.open_attachment_error: Could not open attachment. Is Zotero running?
system.error.remove_message: Do you really want to remove %s?
system.error.tray_not_supported: Tray is not supported. Gnome Extension "KStatusNotifierItem/AppIndicator Support" is required for Tray support on the Gnome Desktop.
system.export_dialog.title: Choose export destination
system.import_fail: The following %s files could not be imported, because their filetype is unknown: %s
system.import_no_directory: You have to select a directory to import to.
system.no_command: Received a message with no command: %s
system.overwrite_file_message: The file %s already exists in this directory. Overwrite?
system.replace_file_message: File %s has been modified remotely. Replace the loaded version with the newer one from disk?
system.save_changes_message: There are unsaved changes to the current file. Do you want to omit them or save?
system.save_changes_select_dir: Please select a directory so that the new file can be saved.
toolbar.remove_fn: Remove the footnote under the cursor
toolbar.share: Share the current file as HTML, DOCX, ODT or PDF
validation.error_range_both: Option %s must be between %s and %s (characters long).
validation.error_range_min: Option %s must be at least %s (characters long).
validation.error_type: Option %s has to be of type %s.
